arl.name: Assault Rifle
arl.desc: The standard Assault Rifle. With its good accuracy and damage, it is highly popular across militaries, mercenaries, PMCs, freelancers, and everyone else in between.

ptl.name: Pistol
ptl.desc: Common amongst civilians, it is mainly used for policing roles and usually not given to militaries. Its near-guaranteed chance for bullets to connect makes up for its low damage.

sgn.name: Shotgun
sgn.desc: Short-range firearm loaded with buckshot rounds. Banned in most places. Deals high damage, though you may experience difficulty hitting with this weapon.

srl.name: Sniper Rifle
srl.desc: Long-range rifle with medium stopping power, favoured by snipers on a budget. Good damage and excellent accuracy, though it can only hold one round.

lmg.name: Light Machine Gun
lmg.desc: A high stopping power machine gun barely wieldable by humans, as ordinarily these would be mounted. As such, you aren't likely to hit with this often.

wel.name: Welding laser
wel.desc: Handheld laser used for welding, typically used by repair drones. Not designed for combat.

dbg.name: Debug Gun
dbg.desc: Gun used in development to skip stuff. Huge damage. 100% chance to hit. And if you're reading this, you're a dirty cheater.

stl.name: Debug Staller Gun
stl.desc: Gun used in development to test long combat. Fuckall damage. 100% chance to hit. And if you're reading this, you're weird for thinking this gun will save you.
